notes: Enhancement: Added teamId and teamspaceId in application collection for data access control
Plugin name update: Renamed plugin from IBM DevOps Build to DevOps Build.

Initial release: This is the first release of the DevOps Build plug-in for HCL DevOps Velocity. The plug-in facilitates integration between DevOps Build and HCL DevOps Velocity, providing enhanced visibility into build processes within CI/CD pipelines.
